MANGS NA RTEN 'BREL GYIS CHAS KA SRAB TU 'GRO ZHES RNAM RTOG
BYED, SDE DPON ZHAL MAR GZIGS LA THUG TSO 'BRUG PHYOGS LA DGA' BA
ZHIG YONG 'DUG PAS 'PHRAL DU 'BRUG LUGS DANG 'BREL ZAB CHE, ZHABS

DRUNG DMAG DPON BKAR LUGS LA THUGS ZHEN BA'I RGYUN GYIS NAR SO
BSAM GRUB DANG KHYAMS STOD PA SOGS DRUNG 'KHOR KAR ZHEN BA MANGS
PAS ZHABS DRUNG DE NYID KYANG THUGS TSOM ZIN PA'I BLA MA ZHVA NAG
GSER MDONGS DANG ROGS PO SHAR PHYOGS RGYAL PO LA 'CHOL

ZHES SDE BSKUR BA PA DANG SKYID SDUG GCIG PA MDZAD PAR GTZANG SDE
SRID KYI THUGS LA RE DOGS KYI KUN RTOG MANG BO SHAR TE SHIN TU MA
MNYES PA'I DGONGS BA'I 'DZIN STANGS GZHAN DU GZHOL BA NI RANG
PHYOGS DPON G-YOG GI GNANG SGO LOG PA'I SKYON KHO NA LAS SDE PA

GTZANG PAR RE 'KHANG BRDUNG RGYU NI MI 'DUG, DE'I RTZA BA YAR
RGYAB TU KHRIMS PHOG NAS 'KHYAB BA'I 'PHAGS SDE BA'I GRAB RJES SU
SDE BA'I NANG ZAB LA SONG BA MKHYEN RAB DPAL BZANG LAS DBANG GIS
BLON POR GYUR PA GZHAN DU BLO 'KHYOGS PA'I RAM 'DEGS DRUNG YIG SA

SKYONG, BYANG GLING SANGS RGYAS, SA LTE BA, SNGON MO BA SOGS
DRUNG 'KHOR DANG NANG ZAN KHA SHAS KYIS BYAS PA RIG NYAMS KYIS
RTZER RDZONG BTZAN BA KHOG TU ZHUGS DUS DE RING NONG SA RUL BA
'DON RGYU YIN CES GSUNGS BAR DRUNG NAS KYIS GSER ZHO GANG DANG
KHA BTAGS SHIG

@024B PHUL TE DA LAM RTEN 'BREL MI LEGS PAS SLAR GNANG CHOG ZHUS
NAS BSHOL ZER DON NGAN GROS BSHAMS PAR BRTEN ZHABS DRUNG DE NYID
SHAM BO GANGS SKOR LA PHEBS SU BCUG BA'I 'PHAGS SDE BA RNAMS
KYANG RUL LAM ZER GANG LTAR BSLUS THABS KYIS RDZON ZUG

PO NAS LA RTZIS SPRAS, KHRI LAM GYIS DBU GNANG NGED KHA SHAS THO
RANGS PHYI ZUR LA BDE SKYID GLING DU SPOS PA'I LAM DU CHUS GANG
BA'I BUM PA KHUR BA DENG NAM SANGS LA ZUG BO NAS MJAL BAR 'ONGS
PA'I ZAS SNA TSOGS KYIS GANG BA'I SNOD THOGS PA DANG PHRAD PA
G-YUL RGYAL RGYUD KYI

DGONGS DON LTAR LAM RTAGS LEGS BAR SNANG, ZHOL GYI SRANG MDOR
'GRO BA'I DUS SKYE BO MANG BOS SGRON ME SBAR TE SMRE SNGAGS KYI
KU CO DANG BCAS NAS PHUD GTOR BA NGED KYI GDONG LA 'THOR BA RNAMS
PHAL CHER BZUNG ZER BA LEGS NYES NI DPYAD BAR DKA', SNGAR SPEL
NAG RIN LHUN BA'I

DGRA SHAR RI BO BDE CHEN BAS PHYAG MDZOD DNGOS GRUB BSAD PAR SDE
PAS DGON PA DMAG GIS BSKOR BA'I TSA 'JUN GNANG BA 'KHON DU BZUNG
STE RDZONG SHOR BA'I NANG PAR RGYAL GLING LDING TSOS RTZE NAS
'JAG KHYAD 'THEN BAS DGON PA'I GRA PA 'GA' BA'I RNAM 'GYUR

BYAS ZER SDE PA LHAS BYIN, SGEM BU BA SOGS DPON ZHEN BA KHA SHAS
KYIS RDZENG LA 'TSANG BA'I GROS BTAB BA NANG SO AA 'DZOM PA CAN
GYIS BSHOL BAS 'JAM CHAGS SU GYUR, RDZONG PA RNAMS GZHOGS MA BDE
BAS GZHAN DU SPOS BA 'GA' TSUL GTZANG DU ZHUS PAR

BRTEN CHU SHUR LHA GSHONGS LTO SKAL DU GNANG STE 'DEGS PA'I LAM
RGYAS NANG BA ZUR RTZA BAS BYAS GRA NANG BRGYUD RIM GYIS LHA
GSHONGS SU SLEBS, GRA LAM PO BA DANG GONG DKAR ZHABS DRUNG GNYIS
NAS NGO SHES KYI SNE LEN TZAM MDZAD ZER, ZHABS DRUNG DE NYID GNAS
TSUL GNAS

BDE PHYEN DU 'DEGS PA'I RTEN 'BREL BSGRIGS, SRAS DANG MI BZANG
RNAMS LA'ANG CHO LO BTAGS, RGYAL BOS KYANG ZHAL NGO LA DA LA'I
PHYAG MDZOD DANG GRONG SMAD NAS LA JA'I SANG SDE PA, BYANG NGOS
NAS

BKRA SHIS PHUN TSOGS LA AUL CHING SDE BA DANG GZHON PA LA MAR GAN
AO THO CHI, STAR SDONG NAS LA JO RIG THU DAR KHAN DEM CHI SOGS
DRUNG 'KHOR DRAG RIS LA CHO LO BYIN, MCHOD YON THUN MONG BKA'
GROS THOG NAS KHAL KHA AO RONG PHYOGS KYI GZHUNG BSTAN PA'I

LEGS SPEL DU DAR KHAN NANG SO DGE 'DUN DAR RGYAS RDZONG BDA'
BYAS, RGYAL BOS SOG YUL DU YONG DGOS TSUL GSUNG BAR RTEN 'BREL
GYI KHYAD NAS KHAS LEN TZAM PHUL, SKYID SHOD KHU DBON NI SA CHA
YONGS RDZOGS MA LHOGS KYI DOGS GTZANG SDE SRID KYI

DGONGS PAR SKAL BA PHRAN BUS CHOG TU RE BAS ZHAL NGO 'ANG MDZAD
BSTAD CING DGE LUGS BYINGS KYI GZIGS NGOR MDZO PHO'I LAM DANG
GSHOL RIS 'KHYOG PO'I DPER SONG, RGYAL PO THEGS PAR RINGS PAS DON
GYI RDO KHAR MA 'KHYOL, RDO GSAL LEN PAR GRAM BU

RAB 'BYAMS PA ZAR [?] BA'I PHYI SHAM THABS TSUN SER PO LA NANG
TSER MA BZHIN RNO BA ZHIG 'DUG PA DES BSGUG SDOD BYAS, RAB 'BYAMS
PA 'DIS SKYID SHOD CHOS RJE'I GSUNG KHA SHAS DPON SLOB GLING SMAD
ZHABS DRUNG LA SPYAN 'BEBS ZHUS 'DUG PAR RDZONG BTZAN GNAM GYI

KA LA DGRA LAG TU SHOR TSUL YONG SNANG BAR PHEBS SGOR BSNGO ZHUS
LLA MTSON CHA BYUNG BA GCOG PA DANG NANG PHYOGS NAS 'BRU DRANGS
TE SROG GCOD MI MDZAD PA LEGS POR MNGON RUNG MANG PO GSOD PA'I
DON DU SBYIN PA GTONG PA'I DPE BZHIN RDZONG BTZIN PO THUGS LA
MKHAR BAS

@086A *, ,SOG BO KHA DRANG BA'I CHED DU LAS DKAR RNAM SMIN GA NAG
PA SA RJES SU LI RANG DKA', DING SANG RANG PHYOGS RNAMS SOG DMAG
GIS BDE GZAR CHE BA ZHIG YONG LA RE MDZAD KYANG RGYAL BA BTZONG
KHA PA'I BSHAD SGRUB KYI BSTAN PA LA MI

PHAN DGA' LDAN PHO BRANG BA LHAS SA GTZOS SDE BDAG CHEN PO GZHAN
SNON NGA'I YUL YIN PA SA NYA RA MDZAD MKHYEN BA DGA' PHEBS PA
SANGS RGYAS KYI GSUNG LTA BU BSAMS KYIN DAD PA'I SOS SU GDA',
DPON SLOB PAn CHEN RIN PO CHE DGA' LDAN KHANG GSAR DU

BZHUGS GDAN 'JAGS, ZLA BA BCU PA DANG BCU GCIG PA'I RING TSA
RTING KHA NAS DGONGS JA'I BAR RGYAL BA BTZONG KHA BA CHEN PO'I
GSUNG 'BUM PO TI BDUN TZAM, THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA DGE 'DUN GRUB
PA'I 'DUL BA'I GLENG 'BUM, MAR MI'I RNAM MGUR, BU

STON RIN PO CHE'I BDE MCHOG GI CHOS 'BYUNG SROGS LUNG MANG PO
DANG RDO RJE 'PHRENG BA'I DBANG BCO LNGA CAM, BZHAN YANG RJES
GNANG KHA SHAS STZAL, NYI MA THUNG ZHING LJAGS LUNG DANG BCAS
DBANG SGRUB SO SO SKYE BO TSE'I BLO DANG 'TSAM PA GNANG RGYU
BYUNG MA SONG RUNG SKYES

BU DAM PA BSKAL PA'ANG SKANG CIG MAR BSGYUR THUB PAS CUNG ZAD
TZAM GYI TING NGA 'DZIN GYIS MDZAD DAM SNYAM LJAGS LUNG GI SKABS
SHIG SBYAN CUNG ZHIG MNYEL BAR SKU 'KHRUGS DOGS 'DUG PAS NYIN
GCIG GNYIS SHIG 'PHROD BSTEN GNANG BA LEGS PA 'DRA

ZHUS PAR DKON COG MKHYEN SNYAM PA BYAS NA DGA' MO YONG 'GRO ZHES
CHOS MTSAMS 'JOG PA MA GNANG YANG MYUR DU GDANGS SONG ZHING DE
BZHIN DU LHA 'DRE MO RTZIS PA GANG LA'ANG THUGS SNANG YE MI GNANG
BAS MTSON PA'I TSE RING NA DGA' 'O RNAM DGANG GYI SOGS GSUNG MGUR

@086B GYI DON PHYAG THOG TU KHEL BA TSUR MTHONG GI 'GRO BA RNAMS
KYI BLA'I YUL DU MI CHUD PAR GDA', ZLA BA BCU GNYIS PA TSES NAS
LHA SA SKOR LA 'BRUM PA PHRAN BU MCHED PAS BDAG GIS CHOS LUNG
BKRA SHIS SGANG DU PHYIN, ZLA 'PHROS DANG DANG PO'I RING GRONG
SMAD NAS KYIS ZLA BO

BYAS TE LE'U THO BCAS, DBU MDZAD DON GRUB BKRA SHIS BA CAN BSKANG

MCHOD PA MA CHAG PAR BTANG, HOR ZLA GNYIS PAR DGA' LDAN KHANG
GSAR DU 'BYOR, ZLA BA GSUM PA'I CHES LNGA GZA'

SKAR GYI 'PHROD BZANG BAR JO BO RIN PO CHE'I SBANG GCAL STENG DU
YONGS RDZOGS BSTAN PA'I MNGA' BDAG PAn CHEN RIN PO CHE BLO BZANG
CHOS GYI RGYAL MTSAN GYIS MKHAN PO DANG GSANG STON, GLING SMAD
ZHABS DRUNG 'JAM DBYANGS DKON COG CHOS 'PHEL GYIS LAS SLOB,

BYES PA ZHAL SNGA NAS RTZES DANG BA BYAMS PA SMON LAM GYIS GRIB
TSONG PA, 'BRAS SPUNGS 'DUL BA SLOB DPON TA ZHING BA THUB BSTAN
RNAM RGYAL, BLO GSAL GLING SLOB DPON PHO KHANG PA 'JAM DBYANGS
BKRA SHIS, RGYAL BA SLOB DPON SGYID THANG BA CHOS PHUN TSOGS,

SNGAGS PA SLOB DPON SE CHEN PA NAM MKHA' RGYA MTSO, SGO MANG SLOB
DPON BSAM SGANG BA BLO BZANG NGAG DBANG, SHAG SGOR SLOB DPON
SNANG RTZE BA PADMA CHOS 'PHEL, BDE YANGS SLOB DPON GER BA, SE RA
STOD PA SLOB DPON KLUN BU BA, SMAD PA SLOB DPON GUNG

RU BA DGU SA KHA SKONG BA MDZAD DE YONGS SU RDZOGS PA DGE SLONG
GI DNGOS POR BSGRUBS, GLING SMAD ZHABS DRUNG GIS LTUNG MTHUN BYIN
BRLABS NAS BZUNG MING RNYING PA'I STENG DU NGAG GI DBANG PHYUG
CES GSAR DU SBYOR BA GNANG, PAn CHEN RIN PO CHE LHO KHA BRGYUD
GTZANG

@087A *, ,DU CHIBS KHA SGYUR SNYE THANG NOR BU SKANG TSUN ZHAL
NGOS CHIBS SKYEL LA PHEBS, RGYAL PO'I 'BUL BA DNGUL TSAR CHES
PA'I PHUD LA RTEN BZHENG ZHIG BYED RTZIS YIN PA'I BSLAB STON ZHU

LUNG KYOG TU SANG BA'I NGOM CHE BA MI YONG 'DUG PAS SER 'BRAS LHA

STZOL DU GNANG, DES THUGS DOGS 'PHROS PA'I RGYAL BYAMS PA'I RGYAB
YOL KYANG RIM 'GYANGS SU LUS, DKA' BCU 'PHRIN LAS

PHUN TSOGS KYIS PHA BONG KHAR RJE DE NYID KYI DNGUL GDUNG BZHENGS
PA'I SHIS BRJOD LA PHYIN, DE NUB DNGUL GDUNG RIN PO CHE'I SKU

DANG RNAM THAR DAD PA'I 'JUG NGOGS KYI CHOS THUN GCIG PHUL, LAM
ZHOR LA PO TA LA'I MCHOD MJAL BYAS, RE ZHIGS GTZANG KHYAD NAS
DGA' LDAN KHANG GSAR DU BSDAD, ZHAL NGO DRAG LAS LA MI MNYES
SHING BLA MA GANG 'DOD KYANG BSTEN CHOG RIGS MIN 'DUG PAS, DA

CHA SNGAGS PHYOGS KYI SMIN GROL LAS TSOGS SOGS MTHA' CHOD PA
TSANG MAR ZHUS RNYED PA DKA' SNYAM RE BA BSKYUNGS HE THA SNYAD

PA'I DRUNG DU SNGAR GYI ZHU 'PHROS GRUB RTZIS KYI LNGA BSDUS NAS
BZUNG ZHAG GSUM

RNAM DBYE'I BAR GYI RTZIS PHAL CHER BYANG BAR SBYANGS, 'GREL BA
MCHOG DGA'I STENG NAS DBYANGS 'CHAR GYI GSUNG BSHAD RAGS BSDUS
ZHUS, MTSAMS SBYOR LNGA BA ZHIG GNANG GIN 'DUG PA'I RI MO BTANG
ZHING SDEB SBYOR ME TOG CHUN PO'I STENG NAS PRITTA'I GSUNG BSHAD

@087B KYANG NYAN, DE'I TSE BDE GSHEGS MCHOD RTEN BRGYAD BZHED

@088B 'DON GYI LEGS BYAR BKA' SHOG CIG BZOS GSUNG BA 'DI PHAN

@090A *, ,RANG BZUNG BA MA SHAR, SA YOS KYI LO GSAR DUS 'DOD GSOL

RTZIS DANG GZA' LNGA'I MGYOGS RTZIS JA'I SANG SDE PAS BKOD, GRUB
RTZIS

GZA' LNGA'I RTZA SLONG, SGROMS SGRIG LO ZLA'I BSHAD PA, MCHOD
BRJOD RNAMS NGED RANG GIS BYAS PA SHAS CHE, KU RU KULLE DANG 'DOD
